[1] Includes the Loss on Deconsolidation of RBH ($239 million) and the Canadian tobacco litigation-related charge ($194 million) that were included in marketing, administration and research costs in the consolidated statements of earnings for the year ended December 31, 2019. For further details on these charges, see Note 20. Deconsolidation of RBH. [2] Includes deconsolidation of RBH cash and cash equivalents of $1,323 million and restricted cash of $23 million. [3] The amounts for cash and cash equivalents shown above include restricted cash of $5 million, $4 million and $27 million as of December 31, 2020, 2019 and 2018, respectively, which were included in other current assets in the consolidated balance sheets.
